article_title: Medical Crowdfunding: Getting by with a little help from your friends
article_text:
Yakima, WA (98901)

Today

Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 76F. WNW winds at 5 to 10 mph, increasing to 15 to 25 mph..

Tonight

Clear skies. Low 44F. W winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author:
Molly Rosbach
mrosbach@yakimaherald.com

og.description: Social media has led to an explosion in recent years of crowdfunding for all sorts of things: the Veronica Mars movie, a potato salad recipe, the Oculus Rift virtual reality
